Uses of Package
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery

Packages that use org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine The BPEL engine, support classes, and engine factory.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery This package contains classes for recovering or regenerating the state of a process from alarms, messages, or faults that the process received. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test This package contains classes for testing the functionality of the recovery engine. 
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine
IAeRecoveryEngine
          Extends IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal to define the interface for a business process engine that can recover the state of a process from a list of IAeJournalEntry instances.
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery
AeRecoveryConflictingRequestException
          Exception thrown during the recovery process to signal a conflicting request.
AeRecoveryEngineFactory
          Implements factory object that constructs a recovery engine along with the recovery engine's managers.
IAeRecoveredItemsSet
          Defines the interface for a set of alarm and queue manager items generated during recoverys.
IAeRecoveryEngine
          Extends IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal to define the interface for a business process engine that can recover the state of a process from a list of IAeJournalEntry instances.
IAeRecoveryProcessManager
          Extends IAeProcessManager to define the interface for a process manager used by an instance of AeRecoveryEngine during recovery.
IAeRecoveryQueueManager
          Extends IAeQueueManager to define the interface for a queue manager used by an instance of AeRecoveryEngine for recovery.
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test
IAeRecoveryEngine
          Extends IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal to define the interface for a business process engine that can recover the state of a process from a list of IAeJournalEntry instances.
